casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
James LEE, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157176
COA: 334308 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 16, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion to extend the time for filing the defendant-appellee's supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 9, 2018.
